languages.text: "Тогда приступим". {n}Чорда подается вперед и пристально смотрит вам в глаза. Едва вы успеваете встретиться взглядами, как Инцендия корчится от боли и хватается за голову. Сделав глубокий вдох, она вновь пытается заглянуть вам в глаза, но новая вспышка боли чуть было не заставляет ее вскрикнуть. В ее взгляде читается непонимание и испуг.{/n}

"Then let us begin." {n}Chorda leans forward and stares intently into your eyes. Scarcely has Incendia's gaze met yours than she begins writhing in pain and clutching her head. She takes a deep breath and tries to look you in the eye again, only for a new flash of pain to almost make her cry out. Confusion and fear are visible in her eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тогда приступим". {n}Чорда подается вперед и пристально смотрит вам в глаза. Едва вы успеваете встретиться взглядами, как Инцендия корчится от боли и хватается за голову. Сделав глубокий вдох, она вновь пытается заглянуть вам в глаза, но новая вспышка боли чуть было не заставляет ее вскрикнуть. В ее взгляде читается непонимание и испуг.{/n}

languages.text: “既然如此，我们就开始吧。”{n}库尔达朝你靠了过来，紧盯着你的眼睛。然而，她的目光才刚刚与你对视，她就痛苦地挣扎着，紧紧地捂住自己的头。她深吸一口气，试图再次直视你的眼睛，但剧痛再次袭击了她，让她差点喊出声来。她的目光中带着明显的迷茫与恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then let us begin." {n}Chorda leans forward and stares intently into your eyes. Scarcely has Incendia's gaze met yours than she begins writhing in pain and clutching her head. She takes a deep breath and tries to look you in the eye again, only for a new flash of pain to almost make her cry out. Confusion and fear are visible in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我们就开始吧。”{n}库尔达朝你靠了过来，紧盯着你的眼睛。然而，她的目光才刚刚与你对视，她就痛苦地挣扎着，紧紧地捂住自己的头。她深吸一口气，试图再次直视你的眼睛，但剧痛再次袭击了她，让她差点喊出声来。她的目光中带着明显的迷茫与恐惧。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「では、始めようか」{n}チョーダは前かがみになり、あなたの目の中を覗き込んだ。間もなくして、インセンディアは苦痛に悶え頭をかきむしる。深い呼吸をしてもう一度あなたの目を覗き込む。しかし、再び鋭い痛みに襲われたインセンディアは涙を流す。混乱と恐怖が、彼女の目に現れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then let us begin." {n}Chorda leans forward and stares intently into your eyes. Scarcely has Incendia's gaze met yours than she begins writhing in pain and clutching her head. She takes a deep breath and tries to look you in the eye again, only for a new flash of pain to almost make her cry out. Confusion and fear are visible in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「では、始めようか」{n}チョーダは前かがみになり、あなたの目の中を覗き込んだ。間もなくして、インセンディアは苦痛に悶え頭をかきむしる。深い呼吸をしてもう一度あなたの目を覗き込む。しかし、再び鋭い痛みに襲われたインセンディアは涙を流す。混乱と恐怖が、彼女の目に現れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Comencemos pues». {n}Chorda se inclina hacia delante y te mira fijamente a los ojos. Apenas ha encontrado tu mirada, Incendia se retuerce de dolor y se agarra la cabeza. Respira hondo e intenta volver a mirarte a los ojos, pero una nueva oleada de dolor casi la hace gritar. La confusión y el miedo son visibles en sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then let us begin." {n}Chorda leans forward and stares intently into your eyes. Scarcely has Incendia's gaze met yours than she begins writhing in pain and clutching her head. She takes a deep breath and tries to look you in the eye again, only for a new flash of pain to almost make her cry out. Confusion and fear are visible in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Comencemos pues». {n}Chorda se inclina hacia delante y te mira fijamente a los ojos. Apenas ha encontrado tu mirada cuando Incendia se retuerce de dolor y se agarra la cabeza. Respira hondo e intenta volver a mirarte a los ojos, pero la sensación de dolor casi le hace gritar. La confusión y el miedo son visibles en sus ojos.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Dann lasst uns beginnen." {n}Chorda beugt sich vor und starrt dir intensiv in die Augen. Kaum trifft Incendias Blick den deinen, beginnt sie sich vor Schmerzen zu krümmen und hält sich den Kopf. Sie atmet tief durch und versucht erneut, dir in die Augen zu sehen, doch erneut durchzuckt sie ein so großer Schmerz, dass sie fast aufschreit. Verwirrung und Furcht sind in ihren Augen zu sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then let us begin." {n}Chorda leans forward and stares intently into your eyes. Scarcely has Incendia's gaze met yours than she begins writhing in pain and clutching her head. She takes a deep breath and tries to look you in the eye again, only for a new flash of pain to almost make her cry out. Confusion and fear are visible in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann lasst uns beginnen." {n}Chorda beugt sich vor und starrt dir intensiv in die Augen. Kaum trifft ihr Blick den deinen, beginnt Incendia sich vor Schmerzen zu krümmen und hält sich den Kopf. Sie atmet tief durch und versucht erneut, dir in die Augen zu sehen, doch erneut durchzuckt sie ein so großer Schmerz, dass sie fast aufschreit. Verwirrung und Furcht sind in ihren Augen zu sehen.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, commençons. » {n}Chorda se penche en avant et vous regarde droit dans les yeux. Presque immédiatement, Incendia se tord de douleur en se tenant la tête entre les mains. Elle prend une profonde inspiration et tente de vous regarder à nouveau, mais un autre élancement de douleur lui arrache presque un cri. Vous lisez la peur et la confusion dans son regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then let us begin." {n}Chorda leans forward and stares intently into your eyes. Scarcely has Incendia's gaze met yours than she begins writhing in pain and clutching her head. She takes a deep breath and tries to look you in the eye again, only for a new flash of pain to almost make her cry out. Confusion and fear are visible in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, commençons. » {n}Chorda se penche en avant et vous regarde droit dans les yeux. Presque immédiatement, elle se tord de douleur en se tenant la tête entre les mains. Elle prend une profonde inspiration et tente de vous regarder à nouveau, mais un autre élancement de douleur lui arrache presque un cri. Vous lisez la peur et la confusion dans son regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Başlayalım o hâlde." {n}Chorda, öne doğru eğilip gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Bakışlarının seninkilerle birleşmesinin üzerinden henüz bir an geçmişken İncendia, acı içinde kıvranmaya başlayıp başını kavrıyor. Derin bir nefes alıyor ve yeniden gözlerine bakmayı deniyor ancak yeni bir acı silsilesi, onu neredeyse hüngür hüngür ağlayacak raddeye getiriyor. Bakışlarına kafa karışıklığı ve korku hâkim oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then let us begin." {n}Chorda leans forward and stares intently into your eyes. Scarcely has Incendia's gaze met yours than she begins writhing in pain and clutching her head. She takes a deep breath and tries to look you in the eye again, only for a new flash of pain to almost make her cry out. Confusion and fear are visible in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Başlayalım o hâlde." {n}Chorda öne doğru eğiliyor ve gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Bakışlarının seninkilerle birleşmesinin üzerinden henüz bir an geçmesinin ardından İncendia acı içinde kıvranmaya başlıyor ve başını kavrıyor. Derin bir nefes alıyor ve yeniden gözlerine bakmayı deniyor ancak yeni bir acı silsilesi onu neredeyse hüngür hüngür ağlayacak raddeye getiriyor. Bakışlarına kafa karışıklığı ve korku hâkim oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
